message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's something I've carefully nurtured and developed, and I'm confident it could significantly benefit your business. I'm offering it to you at a price of $950,000.  This is a fair price that allows you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate while ensuring I receive a fair return on my investment. I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial partnership. Let me know what you think!
